sentences.sCn: 这些仪器计算距离非常精确。

sentences.sContent: ...especially if it can't calculate survival odds...
...One recent study attempted to calculate the extent of this "ecological overshoot of the human economy"...
...But when all those factors are put together and the economists calculate the numbers...

phrases.pCn: 适合于……；为适合…而设计的

计算的；深谋远虑的；审慎的
可计算的；能预测的；可靠的
计算的，善于计算的；精明的
计算；估计；计算的结果；深思熟虑
计算；估计；打算（calculate的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 计算， 推算； 计划， 打算
trans.tranOther: to find out how much something will cost, how long something will take etc, by using numbers
